statements: SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, department FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM operational_risk_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(*) AS incidents_count FROM operational_risk_incidents GROUP BY incident_type;
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, department FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_date, department FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE department = 'HR' AND incident_type = 'Fraud';
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY incident_type, incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE department = 'IT' AND incident_type = 'Malware Attack' ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, location FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT incident_date, location, description FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM risk_categories WHERE severity = 'high';
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE location = 'Head Office' AND incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents JOIN risk_categories ON operational_risk_incidents.category_id = risk_categories.category_id WHERE risk_categories.severity = 'high';
SELECT incident_id, location FROM operational_risk_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT oi.incident_id, oi.location, rc.category_name FROM operational_risk_incidents AS oi LEFT JOIN risk_categories AS rc ON oi.category_id = rc.category_id WHERE rc.severity = 'medium';
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, department_id FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, department_id, severity_level FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM operational_risk_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT incident_description, severity_level FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments JOIN operational_risk_incidents ON departments.department_id = operational_risk_incidents.department_id;
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, department FROM operational_risk_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, department FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT incident_id, department, description FROM operational_risk_incidents JOIN incident_responsibility ON operational_risk_incidents.incident_id = incident_responsibility.incident_id WHERE responsible_employee = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, department, description FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE department = 'Finance';

SELECT i.incident_id, i.incident_date, r.category_name, ir.responsible_employee FROM operational_risk_incidents i JOIN risk_categories r ON i.incident_id = r.category_id JOIN incident_responsibility ir ON i.incident_id = ir.incident_id;
SELECT i.incident_id, i.incident_date, s.status_name FROM operational_risk_incidents i JOIN incident_status s ON i.incident_id = s.status_id WHERE i.incident_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT i.incident_id, i.incident_date, ir.responsible_employee, s.status_name FROM operational_risk_incidents i JOIN incident_responsibility ir ON i.incident_id = ir.incident_id JOIN incident_status s ON ir.incident_id = s.status_id ORDER BY i.incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE department_name = 'Finance';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, department_name FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id WHERE department_name = 'Marketing';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, department_name, incident_description FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM incident_types ORDER BY incident_type ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id WHERE departments.department_name = 'Finance';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM operational_risk_incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM incident_assignments WHERE status = 'Assigned' ORDER BY assigned_date DESC;
